requestManagement.title: Request Management
requestManagement.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this request?
requestManagement.retryConfirm: Are you sure you want to retry this request?
requestManagement.batchDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the selected {{count}} requests?
requestManagement.batchRetryConfirm: Are you sure you want to retry the selected {{count}} requests? (Only failed ones will be retried)

requestDetails.title: Request Details
requestDetails.deletedWarning: Request {{id}} has been deleted. Closing detail view.
requestDetails.noProblemDetails: Structured problem details not found in response.
requestDetails.noAnalysisDetails: Modification analysis not found in response.
requestDetails.noOriginalCode: Original code not found in response.
requestDetails.noModifiedCode: Modified code not found in response.
requestDetails.diffMissingSource: Cannot generate diff: Missing original code or user prompt.
requestDetails.diffGeneralError: No code modifications or error generating diff.

settingsPage.title: Settings
settingsPage.profileUpdateErrorNoUser: Cannot update profile: User data not loaded.
settingsPage.profileUpdateSuccessUsernameChanged: Profile updated successfully! Username changed, please log in again.
settingsPage.passwordMinLengthError: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
settingsPage.restartNoteDescription: Some settings (like Max Concurrent Tasks) may require restarting the backend service to take effect.
settingsPage.profileNewPasswordTooltip: Enter a new password to update. Leave blank to keep the current password.
settingsPage.profileNewPasswordPlaceholder: Leave blank to keep current password

openai_api_key.label: OpenAI API Key
openai_api_key.tooltip: Your secret API key (masked, will be updated if value is entered)

openai_base_url.label: OpenAI Base URL
openai_base_url.tooltip: Optional proxy or compatible API endpoint (leave empty for default)

system_prompt.label: System Prompt
system_prompt.tooltip: The instruction given to the AI model

max_concurrent_analysis_tasks.label: Max Concurrent Analysis Tasks
max_concurrent_analysis_tasks.tooltip: Limits simultaneous user analysis tasks system-wide (requires backend restart)

parallel_openai_requests_per_prompt.label: Parallel OpenAI Requests per Prompt
parallel_openai_requests_per_prompt.tooltip: Number of simultaneous OpenAI calls for one user request

max_total_openai_attempts_per_prompt.label: Max Total OpenAI Attempts per Prompt
max_total_openai_attempts_per_prompt.tooltip: Maximum total OpenAI calls (including parallel) for one user request

request_timeout_seconds.label: Request Timeout (seconds)
request_timeout_seconds.tooltip: Max time for a single OpenAI response

loginPage.title: Admin Login
loginPage.errorMessage: Login failed. Please check your credentials.

logViewer.title: Log Viewer
logViewer.selectFileMessage: Please select a log file to view.

statusIndicator.failedMessage: Could not complete analysis. Please check input or try again later.
